word_mean_info__list.difference: 通常指为实现许诺、协议、计划、合同等而订出的必须遵守或满足的作为前提的条件或要求。
指谈判或订立合同等时，一方或双方提出或同意的条件。
多指周围的情况或某事发生时的情况。
指一个人在政治、社会、经济、法律上的地位或身份，暗含地位显要意味。也可用于指政治等事态的状况。
一般强调产生影响的原因或环境，复数形式指笼统的情况。
普通用词，指人或物在环境、外表、心灵以及健康方面的状况，或指在某一阶段的状态或形式。
指明确具体的环境情况或处境。

崭新, 完美, 完好无缺

bilingual.source: His health condition is not very good.
The condition of this house is very good.

bilingual.target: 我们简单地不能接受这个条件。

bilingual.source: The first condition for success is perseverance.
bilingual.target: 成功的首要条件是坚持不懈。

bilingual.source: Sexual intercourse is a necessary condition for reproduction.
bilingual.target: 交媾是生育的必要条件。

bilingual.source: This temperature is the optimum condition for plant growth.
bilingual.target: 这个温度是植物生长的最优条件。

bilingual.source: Our contract terms include a payable at sight condition.
bilingual.target: 我们的合同条款中包括见票即付的条件。

bilingual.source: In logic, a ternary condition can have three possible outcomes.
bilingual.target: 在逻辑中，三元条件可以有三种可能的结果。

bilingual.source: The first condition is that you must complete the task on time.
bilingual.target: 首要条件是你必须按时完成任务。

bilingual.source: You can add a condition in the inner loop to terminate the loop.
bilingual.target: 你可以在内循环中添加一个条件来终止循环。

list.abstract: condition(英 [kənˈdɪʃn]，美 [kənˈdɪʃn])，英语单词。作名词为：情况；环境；条件。作动词为：制约；影响；决定。例句：He is now in a stable condition.（他目前情况稳定。） condition的近义词：circumstance；situation；adapt。

yingyinNormal.en: It's my understanding there is a condition attached.
yingyinNormal.zh: 据我所知是有条件的。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, come on, Sheldon. Hold on. I have one condition.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，走吧，谢尔顿。等下，我有个条件。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, yes. And she understands that condition? You've spoken with her?
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的。她明白这个条件吧，你跟她谈过了。

yingyinNormal.en: I told Sheikh I'd go on one condition. I'd get to bring my three best girlfriends.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我跟谢赫说我去是有条件的，我要带上三个闺蜜。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, my apologies, sir. I wasn't clear. I meant our condition, not yours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，先生，我没说清楚，我是指我们的条件，不是你们的。

yingyinNormal.en: Tell me, do you know, was it a condition of his bail that he not contact any of the witnesses? It was. Thank you, Detective.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是否清楚，他保释的条件之一就是不与任何证人联系？是的。谢谢你，警探。

yingyinNormal.en: What? She can't do that. Well, technically, she can add any condition she wants. Fine. Then you hand the petal to Miguel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？她不能那样做，理论上讲，她可以添加任何条件。好吧。现在你把花瓣给他。

yingyinNormal.en: Only on one condition, Claire. I don't want us to work our asses off getting this bill passed just to see it knocked down in the courts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只有一个条件，克莱尔。我不希望我们为法案通过忙里忙外，却在法院被否决。

yingyinNormal.en: I've one condition. When Hennessy finds the bombers, he tells me directly. Then we take them down. Not you. This is non-negotiable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有个条件。汉尼斯找到袭击者后，让他直接告诉我，然后由我们拿下他们，不用你们插手。这点没有商量的余地。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, this is a good one. Is it my birthday? You want help? Yes, please. One condition. OK. Take all the credit. It gets boring if I just solve them all.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个案子好，是送我的生日礼物吗？想让我帮忙？对，拜托了。有个条件。好。功劳都归你， 所有案子都是我破的，太无聊了。

yingyinNormal.en: Visual cues? It's a medical condition.
yingyinNormal.zh: 视觉提示物？有这种健康问题。

yingyinNormal.en: We don't know how serious his condition may be.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不知道他的情况有多严重。

yingyinNormal.en: In one condition it was the blind condition, so people did not know that one beer had vinegar in one not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 实验一，没有透露给被实验者这样没人知道有杯啤酒里有醋，另一杯没有。

yingyinNormal.en: Each of us has a code for our optimal physical condition.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们每个人都有自己身体最佳状况的遗传密码。

yingyinNormal.en: The woman has a heart condition. Think of it as a good deed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个女人有心脏疾病，我们这就当是做了善行了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, yes, born alone, die alone. It's a tragic human condition.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然了，孤单的出生，孤独的死去，人类就是如此悲剧。

yingyinNormal.en: Medical condition? What are you, fucking Sunjay Gupta? Play the goddamn music.
yingyinNormal.zh: 健康问题？你他妈以为自己是桑基·古普塔么？给我打鼓去。

yingyinNormal.en: You had just broken my heart. I made a decision I was in no condition to make.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你伤了我的心，于是我做出了我以前一定做不出的决定。

yingyinNormal.en: It turns out that in this condition most people would prefer the one with some vinegar.
yingyinNormal.zh: 结果证明在这种情况下，大多数人更喜欢加了醋的啤酒。

yingyinNormal.en: And on top of that, she has a minor heart condition. I think this could possibly be not good for that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 另外，最主要的是，她有点心脏疾病，我认为，这很可能会对她的病情不利。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (居住/工作/做事的)环境; 条件

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 有条件的；有前提的；视…而定的；表示条件的；条件的

word_family.mean: n. 情况；状态；状况；环境；条件；前提；病；疾病；身份

sense_info_list.en: a person's or animal's state of health or physical fitness

examination_example.sentence: Their unhealthy dental <highlight>condition</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们不健康的牙齿状况。

examination_example.sentence: And there are health <highlight>conditions</highlight> for which being overweight is actually protective.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一些健康状况下，超重实际上是有保护作用的。

examination_example.sentence: When we are deprived of green, of plants, of trees, most of us give in to a demoralization of spirit which we usually blame on some psychological <highlight>conditions</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们失去了绿色，植物和树木，我们中的大多数人都会陷入精神上的消沉，我们通常会将这归咎于一些心理因素。

sense_info_list.en: the circumstances or situation in which people live, work or do things
sense_info_list.zh: (居住/工作/做事的)环境; 条件

examination_example.sentence: In 2007, Indonesia started phasing in a program that gives money to its poorest residents under certain <highlight>conditions</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2007年，印尼开始分阶段实施一项计划，在一定条件下向最贫困的居民提供资金。

examination_example.sentence: A series of fires (including those set by the British in 1814) and overcrowded <highlight>conditions</highlight> led to the construction of the existing Treasury Building.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一系列火灾（包括英国人在1814年纵火）和过度拥挤的条件导致了现有国库大楼的建造。

examination_example.sentence: But the force of geographic <highlight>conditions</highlight> peculiar to America and the sheer difficulty of maintaining old-world ways in a raw, new continent caused significant changes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，美国特有的地理条件的力量，以及在一个原始的新大陆上保持旧世界方式的困难，导致了重大的变化。

sense_info_list.en: a state of affairs that must exist or be brought about before something else is possible or permitted

examination_example.sentence: On the one hand, it's a necessary <highlight>condition</highlight> for many worthwhile things: child care, friendships, etc.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一方面，它是许多有价值的事情的必要条件：照顾孩子、交朋友等等。

examination_example.sentence: Instead of wordy, worthy strategies, future governments need to do more to provide the <highlight>conditions</highlight> for sport to thrive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 未来的政府需要做得更多，为体育繁荣提供条件，而不是冗长而有价值的战略。

examination_example.sentence: As a <highlight>condition</highlight> of receiving state approval for the sale, the company agreed to seek permission from state regulators to operate past 2012.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为获得州政府批准的条件之一，该公司同意向州政府监管机构申请在2012年之后运营的许可。

examination_example.sentence: extreme weather <highlight>conditions</highlight> may arise
examination_example.sentence_trans: 极端天气情况可能会出现

examination_example.sentence: Over the past decade, the focus has been on climate change — how the warming of the Earth from greenhouse gases is leading to <highlight>conditions</highlight> that worsen fires.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在过去的十年里，人们关注的焦点一直是气候变化——温室气体导致的地球变暖是如何导致火灾恶化的。

examination_example.sentence: Mauna Kea's peak rises above the bulk of our planet's dense atmosphere, where <highlight>conditions</highlight> allow telescopes to obtain images of unsurpassed clarity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Mauna Kea的顶峰耸立在地球稠密的大气层之上，望远镜在那里可以有条件获取无比清晰的图像。

sense_info_list.en: the state of something with regard to its appearance, quality, or working order
any of different types of diseases
a rule or decision that you must agree to, sometimes forming part of a contract or an official agreement
set prior requirements on something before it can occur/be done
train or accustom someone or something to behave in a certain way, or to accept certain circumstances

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 居住环境；生活状况；生活条件

sense_info_list.en: the circumstances affecting the way in which people live or work, especially with regard to their safety or well-being

examination_example.sentence: And the living <highlight>conditions</highlight> in the hut were primitive, to say the least.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 至少可以说，小屋的生活条件很原始。

examination_example.sentence: How were the weather <highlight>conditions</highlight> while you were there?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你在那里的时候天气怎么样？

examination_example.sentence: Only some can be put to use under current traffic <highlight>conditions</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在目前的交通条件下，只有部分（车辆）能够投入使用。

examination_example.sentence: Extant <highlight>conditions</highlight> also matter in terms of when and how often we lie.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 外部条件也影响着我们何时说谎以及说谎的频率。

examination_example.sentence: Unique characteristics of their own behavior include <highlight>conditions</highlight> that could indicate the need for some form of intervention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们自身行为的独特特征包括可能表明需要某种形式干预的条件。

sense_info_list.en: the state of something with regard to its appearance, quality, or working order
a person's or animal's state of health or physical fitness

examination_example.sentence: The findings held even after the researchers considered factors that could affect the link, including whether participants had health <highlight>conditions</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使研究人员考虑了可能影响这种联系的因素，这些发现仍然成立，包括参与者是否患有健康问题。

sense_info_list.en: any of different types of diseases
social position or rank
a state of affairs that must exist or be brought about before something else is possible or permitted

word_usage.usage:
condition可表示“健康状况或可使用的状况”，作不可数名词。
史密斯先生的健康状况：the condition of Mr. Smith或Mr. Smith's condition
好好保养汽车：keep the car in good condition

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 多指周围的情况或某事发生时的情况。
一般强调产生影响的原因或环境, 复数形式指笼统的情况。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 健康状况；健康状态；卫生条件

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 调节剂；改良剂；调节器；护发素；护发剂

word_family.mean: n. 情况；状态；状况；环境；条件；前提；病；疾病；身份

sense_info_list.en: a person's or animal's state of health or physical fitness

examination_example.sentence: Three children in every classroom have a diagnosable mental health <highlight>condition</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个教室有三个孩子有可诊断的心理健康状况。

examination_example.sentence: Young people have reported that for low-level <highlight>conditions</highlight> such as stress and anxiety, a clinical setting can sometimes be daunting (令人却步的) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 年轻人报告说，健康状况不佳时，比如倍感压力和焦虑时，临床环境有时会令人望而生畏。

examination_example.sentence: It indicates one's health <highlight>condition</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它表明一个人的健康状况。

sense_info_list.en: the circumstances affecting the way in which people live or work; especially with regard to their safety or well-being

examination_example.sentence: Under the <highlight>conditions</highlight> where the air can be extremely dry or moist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在空气极度干燥或潮湿的条件下。

examination_example.sentence: Please start to plan your journey now and consider if you really need to travel when <highlight>conditions</highlight> are this poor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请现在就开始计划你的旅程，并考虑在条件如此恶劣的环境下，你是否真的需要旅行。

examination_example.sentence: Scotland's transport minister has warned of potentially extreme weather <highlight>conditions</highlight> as heavy snow is forecast across the country later this week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 苏格兰交通部长警告说，由于本周晚些时候全国将有大雪，可能会出现极端天气环境。

sense_info_list.en: any of different types of diseases

examination_example.sentence: They were also more likely to have an ongoing medical <highlight>condition</highlight> and be overweight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们也更有可能有持续的医疗状况，以及超重现象。

examination_example.sentence: "Married women diagnosed with a serious health <highlight>condition</highlight> may find themselves struggling with the impact of their disease while also experiencing the stress of divorce, " said researcher Amelia Karraker.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员 Amelia Karraker 说：“被确诊身患重疾的已婚女性也许会发现自己在努力对抗疾病侵袭的同时，也在经历着离婚的压力。”

sense_info_list.en: the state of something with regard to its appearance; quality; or working order

examination_example.sentence: Most of the furniture you will see is original and in good <highlight>condition</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你将看到的大多数家具都是原装的，状况良好。

sense_info_list.en: a rule or decision that you must agree to; sometimes forming part of a contract or an official agreement

word_usage.usage:
condition可表示“健康状况或可使用的状况”，作不可数名词。
史密斯先生的健康状况：the condition of Mr. Smith或Mr. Smith's condition
好好保养汽车：keep the car in good condition

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 多指周围的情况或某事发生时的情况。
一般强调产生影响的原因或环境，复数形式指笼统的情况。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 健康状况；健康状态；卫生条件
居住环境；生活状况；生活条件
状况良好；在良好状况下；良好状态

sense_info_list.en: the circumstances affecting the way in which people live or work, especially with regard to their safety or well-being

examination_example.sentence: Icon's houses have been designed to hold up in earthquake <highlight>conditions</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在设计上，Icon的房子可以抗得过地震。

examination_example.sentence: As a result, nearly all these cycads die because the living <highlight>conditions</highlight> have changed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 结果，由于生活条件的改变，几乎所有的苏铁都死了。

examination_example.sentence: They help the bus to deal with complex (复杂的) road <highlight>conditions</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们帮公交车处理复杂的路况。

sense_info_list.en: the state of something with regard to its appearance, quality, or working order

examination_example.sentence: The air <highlight>condition</highlight> was not good enough.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以前的空气状况不够好。

examination_example.sentence: Doing sports daily will make people remain in good <highlight>condition</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每天做运动会让人保持良好的状态。

examination_example.sentence: Two-thirds of Internet users look online for information about a certain disease or medical <highlight>condition</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 三分之二的互联网用户在网上寻找有关某种疾病或医疗状况的信息。

sense_info_list.en: any of different types of diseases

examination_example.sentence: Susannah Fox says one in five Internet users has gone online to find other people who have the same <highlight>condition</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 苏珊娜·福克斯说，五分之一的互联网用户上网寻找其他患有同样病症的人。

examination_example.sentence: Charlie's life dream was to become a soldier, but he would never be able to because of his leg <highlight>condition</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 查理的人生梦想是成为一名军人，但他腿部的伤病注定他永远无法实现这一梦想。

examination_example.sentence: Because he never hope in his own <highlight>condition</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为他从不指望自己的病能够康复。

sense_info_list.en: a state of affairs that must exist or be brought about before something else is possible or permitted

examination_example.sentence: Confidence is an important <highlight>condition</highlight> if you want to achieve success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你想取得成功，信心是重要的前提。

名词后缀

word_usage.usage:
condition可表示“健康状况或可使用的状况”，作不可数名词。
史密斯先生的健康状况：the condition of Mr. Smith或Mr. Smith's condition
好好保养汽车：keep the car in good condition

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指人的健康状况或事物所处的状态，复数形式可指影响某事发生的一切因素。
普通用词，指人或物在环境、外表、心灵以及健康方面的状况，或指在某一阶段的状态或形式。
指明确具体的环境情况或处境。
通常指为实现许诺、协议、计划、合同等而订出的必须遵守或满足的前提条件。
指谈判或订立合同等时，一方或双方提出或同意的条件。
